title: Verify SDN Tool Installation
description: Confirm that all required SDN tools are properly installed and functional
instructions:
1. Open a terminal
2. Run 'sudo mn --version' to check Mininet
3. Run 'ryu-manager --version' to check RYU
4. Run 'ovs-vsctl --version' to check Open vSwitch
5. Document the version numbers
hints: If tools are missing, install via apt or pip

title: Single-VM Controller Connection
description: Set up and verify a working SDN environment
instructions:
1. Start RYU controller
2. Start Mininet with remote controller
3. Verify connection with ovs-vsctl show
4. Test with pingall

title: Exploring Mininet CLI
instructions:
1. Start Mininet with minimal topology
2. Run 'nodes' command
3. Run 'net' command
4. Run 'pingall'
5. Document outputs
